document.discussion_title: Claressa Shields Has Another Gold Medal, and She's Not Stopping There
document.topic_text: After winning her second gold medal in four years in Rio, boxer Claressa Shields looks ahead to Tokyo and to making an impact outside of the ring. »
document.post: After winning her second gold medal in four years in Rio, boxer Claressa Shields looks ahead to Tokyo and to making an impact outside of the ring. »
